General.Name: Pamapol S.A.
General.Description: Pamapol S.A. provides food products in Poland. It offers readymade meals, soups, canned food, and pates. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Rusiec, Poland.

2.Name: Mr. Igor  Fortuna
2.Title: R&D Director, Production Plant Director and Member of the Management Board

6.Name: Mr. Rafal  Tuzimek
6.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Independent Member of the Supervisory Board
